Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Point>

    class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Point>
    Class Point. A point object consists of double type coordinate x and y. A point object determines the position of all objects summoned in the Aquarium.
    Version:
    20 April 2018
    Author:
    Rabbi Fijar Mayoza --13516081
